description.value:
Misfortune, pestilence, and nightmares follow your family like vermin drawn to carrion. Somewhere in your family history, a hag’s foul influence entered your bloodline. You may actually be related to the hag, or you may still be suffering the effects of a curse that a hag laid upon your kin in generations past. Now the hag’s powers are part of your heritage.

Class Skill: Perception.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Ray Of Enfeeblement}(3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{Touch of Idiocy} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vlzave855irdc7yu]{Ray of Exhaustion} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{Bestow Curse} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66vvhyiy5q8yzbq2]{Feeblemind} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{Eyebite} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{Insanity}(15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ef75tkrzjuotgra2]{Dimensional Lock} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{Energy Drain} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{Alertness},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{Combat Casting},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{Deceitful},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{Defensive Combat Training},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{Endurance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{Mounted Combat}.

Bloodline Arcana: You count as a hag for the purpose of joining a hag’s coven. The coven must contain at least one hag. In addition, whenever you are within 30 feet of another sorcerer with this bloodline or a witch with the coven hex, you can use the aid another action to grant a +1 bonus to the other spellcaster’s caster level for 1 round.
